results.title: Beloved
results.creator_credit: Daniel Zinkant, Elle Farnham, First Light and Suited & Booted Studios
results.brief_description: Through the main protagonist Dave, we hear and see what it is like to be in love and have those feelings trapped inside. As we are let into Dave’s world, we see him and a group of friends as they leave school and embark on their journey home. The film flicks between two worlds of fantasy and real-life as the journey progresses. As the narrative comes to an end, we watch the three friends depart and Dave is left alone. His love unknown, unsaid but only understood by the viewer.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Daniel Zinkant, Elle Farnham, First Light and Suited & Booted Studios

results.title: Here to Fall
results.creator_credit: Kris Kelly, Jim Agnew, Evelyn McGrath, Arts Council (Ireland), Blacknorth and Irish Film Board
results.brief_description: A girl falls through darkness. A signal is broadcast, it’s a call. City wires connect and vibrate. The digital signal holds her, dropping her to a city’s rooftops that builds around her. She recognises it, and she’s safe, but for how long?
results.creator_credit_for_label: Kris Kelly, Jim Agnew, Evelyn McGrath, Arts Council (Ireland), Blacknorth and Irish Film Board

results.title: The Voorman Problem
results.creator_credit: Mark Gill, Baldwin Li, Alastair Connolly and Honlodge
results.brief_description: Doctor Williams, a psychiatrist, is called to a prison to examine Voorman – an inmate with a peculiar affliction – he believes he is a god. The problem is, though, that he’s managed to convince the rest of the prison population that he is indeed telling the truth.
